trans-unit.source: Each property of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemPens" /> class is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of a Windows display element and that has a width of 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemPens" /> 類別的每個屬性都是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為 Windows 顯示項目的色彩，並且寬度為 1 像素。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立點和使用數個多載的運算子為這些型別定義的大小。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: 建立表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`subtractButton`。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's `Paint` event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`CreatePointsAndSizes`方法從表單的`Paint`事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為使用中視窗框線的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the active window's border.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為現用視窗的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.ActiveBorder%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.ActiveBorder%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawWithActiveBorderPen` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithActiveBorderPen`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為使用中視窗標題列的背景色彩。

trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithActiveCaptionPen`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，這是使用中視窗標題列之文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為現用視窗標題列中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，這是應用程式工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the application workspace.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為應用程式工作區的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The application workspace is the area in a multiple document view that is not being occupied by documents.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式工作區是不被佔用的文件的多個文件檢視中的區域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.AppWorkspace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.AppWorkspace%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為 3D 項目的醒目提示色彩。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為 3D 項目的反白顯示色彩。

trans-unit.source: This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
trans-unit.target: 這個色彩會套用至面對光源的 3D 項目部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.GradientInactiveCaption%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.GradientInactiveCaption%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawWithGradientInactiveCaptionPen` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithGradientInactiveCaptionPen`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為暗灰色文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為暗灰色文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.
trans-unit.target: 清單中停用的項目會以暗灰色的文字來顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.GrayText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.GrayText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawWithGrayTextPen` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithGrayTextPen`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為選取之項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the background of selected items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為選取項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the pen may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，畫筆可能使用的清單方塊中選取項目的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立點和使用數個多載的運算子為這些型別定義的大小。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.Highlight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.Highlight%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: 建立表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>名為`subtractButton`。

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`CreatePointsAndSizes`方法從表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為選取之項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text of selected items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為選取項目的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目可能包含功能表項目，以及選取的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the pen may be the color used for the text of selected items in a list box.
trans-unit.target: 例如，畫筆可能使用的清單方塊中選取的項目文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawWithWindowFramePen` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithWindowFramePen`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，其為視窗工作區中 (client area) 文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" /> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Pen" />，為視窗工作區中文字的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.WindowText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens.WindowText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawWithWindowText` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawWithWindowText`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
